long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Play more games on the top-left menu.

Overview:
The "Police Car Simulator Offline" extension is the ultimate choice for those seeking an authentic and immersive experience of life as a law enforcement officer. Unlike other simulation games, this extension provides a captivating and action-packed adventure even when you're not connected to the internet. Step into the world of policing without any online distractions and enjoy the thrill of patrolling the virtual city streets as a dedicated cop.

Key Features:

Realistic Police Vehicles: Take command of a diverse fleet of police vehicles, meticulously designed to resemble their real-life counterparts. From standard patrol cars to specialized units, every detail is faithfully recreated, including functional sirens and lights.

Offline Gameplay: With this extension, you can enjoy the excitement of policing without the need for an internet connection. Perfect for those times when you want to unwind or pass the time while offline.

Dynamic Missions: Engage in a wide variety of dynamic missions and scenarios that challenge your policing skills. Respond to emergencies, chase down suspects, maintain public order, and more, all within an offline environment.
